author: wtopstaff
title: Hawks-Pelicans, Box
text:
By The Associated Press October 9, 2015 10:06 pm ATLANTA (103) 
Bazemore 2-3 6-7 10, Millsap 4-12 0-0 9, Horford 4-9 0-0 10, Teague 1-5 2-2 4, Korver 2-6 5-5 10, Splitter 3-3 3-6 9, Schroder 3-8 4-4 11, Hardaway Jr. 2-4 1-2 7, Muscala 2-3 1-2 6, Scott 3-7 2-2 9, Ju.Holiday 0-4 0-0 0, Tavares 3-5 2-6 8, Mack 1-2 0-0 2, Petteway 1-1 0-0 2, Patterson 2-2 0-0 6, Barron 0-0 0-0 0. Totals 33-74 26-36 103. NEW ORLEANS (93) 
Cunningham 0-4 3-4 3, Davis 8-15 2-4 20, Perkins 0-2 0-0 0, Jr.Holiday 2-5 3-3 7, Gordon 1-4 0-0 2, Anderson 0-4 1-2 1, Evans 8-15 0-0 17, Babbitt 2-6 2-3 8, Cole 1-8 2-2 4, Gee 3-5 2-2 9, Douglas-Roberts 1-2 4-4 6, Adrien 0-0 2-6 2, Dejean-Jones 3-6 0-0 6, Webster 1-4 0-0 2, Kilpatrick 2-4 1-1 6. Totals 32-84 22-31 93. Atlanta
